actr.model

Class Declarative

  • java.lang.Object
    • actr.model.Module
      • actr.model.Declarative

  • public class Declarative
extends Module
    Declarative memory that holds chunks of declarative knowledge.
    Author:
    Dario Salvucci

        Gets the similarity of two chunks.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
